mapper.select: SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , '1' AS GUBUN_CODE /*자료구분*/ , CST_NO , (SELECT CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS WHERE CST_NO = T1.CST_NO) AS CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , SUM(SL_CTR_AMT) AS SUM_AMT /*매출조정금액*/ FROM ( SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , CST_NO , SL_CTR_AMT /*매출조정금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_CNFM_BAS WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(SL_RCOG_DT,1,8) = #{bsdt} AND SL_CTR_AMT > 0 ) T1 GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, CST_NO

SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , '2' AS GUBUN_CODE /*자료구분 - 환불*/ , CST_NO , (SELECT CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS WHERE CST_NO = T1.CST_NO ) AS CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , SUM(THM_ISTM_RFND_AMT) AS SUM_AMT /*당월환불금액*/ FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T1.CST_NO , T2.THM_ISTM_RFND_AMT /*당월환불금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_CNFM_BAS T1 LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(T1.SL_RCOG_DT,1,8) = #{bsdt} AND T2.THM_ISTM_RFND_AMT > 0 ) T1 GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, CST_NO

SELECT CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , '3' AS GUBUN_CODE /*자료구분 - 환불*/ , CST_NO , (SELECT CST_KNM FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS WHERE CST_NO = T1.CST_NO) AS CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , SUM(SL_STP_AMT) AS SUM_AMT /*당월환불금액*/ FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO /*계약번호*/ , T1.CNTR_SN /*계약일련번호*/ , T1.CST_NO , T2.SL_STP_AMT /*매출중지금액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_CNFM_BAS T1 LEFT JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ T2 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.CNTR_SN WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(T1.SL_RCOG_DT,1,8) = #{bsdt} AND T2.SL_STP_YN = 'Y' ) T1 GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, CST_NO
